    \index{Chatbot \textit{(package)}!Chatbot.data\_utils \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module Chatbot.data\_utils}

    \label{Chatbot:data_utils}
Utilities for downloading data from WMT, tokenizing, vocabularies.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                               Functions                               %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

  \subsection{Functions}

    \label{Chatbot:data_utils:basic_tokenizer}
    \index{Chatbot \textit{(package)}!Chatbot.data\_utils \textit{(module)}!Chatbot.data\_utils.basic\_tokenizer \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{basic\_tokenizer}(\textit{sentence})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Very basic tokenizer: split the sentence into a list of tokens.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
